globalHeaders.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'sha256-HASH_FOR_THEME_SCRIPT' 'sha256-HASH_FOR_TARIFF_PAGE_SCRIPT'; style-src 'self' https://fonts.googleapis.com 'sha256-HASH_FOR_RATE_CARD_STYLES'; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' data:; frame-src 'self' https://www.google.com https://www.youtube.com;
